name: get_chinese_news
description: Fetches Chinese news headlines with support for various categories.

type.description: The type of news. Available options are specified in the enum below.

page.description: The current page number, default is 1 (max 50).

page_size.description: The number of articles per page, default is 30 (max 30).

is_filter.description: Whether to return only articles with content details (1: yes, 0: no). Default is 0.
